description.en:
Due to the situation like the second IMF, the security company Jang Taesan worked for goes bankrupt, and he becomes an unemployed man wandering around Noryangjin-dong. He loses his life saving an elementary school student who was almost hit by a car. But thanks to his good deed, he goes 14 years back in time and is welcomed to a new life.

However the joy of being revived is short-lived. The thought of having to take the college entrance exam again makes me dizzy... But I remember all of the CSAT problems that I encountered while studying and the stock market graph I saw while working as a stockbroker...?! The last life was ruined, but the this next life will become a success!
description.pt-br: Devido a uma certa situação com FMI(Fundo Monetário internacional), a empresa de segurança para a qual Jang Taesan trabalhava vai à falência e ele se torna um homem desempregado vagando por Noryangjin-dong. Ele perde a vida salvando um estudante do ensino fundamental que quase foi atropelado. Mas, graças à sua boa ação, ele volta 14 anos no tempo e é bem-vindo a uma nova vida. No entanto, a alegria de ser revivido dura pouco. A ideia de ter de fazer o vestibular de novo me deixa tonto... Mas como eu me lembro de todos os problemas do CSAT que encontrei enquanto estudava e do gráfico do mercado de ações que vi enquanto trabalhava como corretor da bolsa...?! A última vida foi arruinada, mas a próxima vida vai ser um sucesso!

We’ll Take the Unwanted Villainesses, and We'll Take Her Back to Our Own Country.

description.ja:
私が転生したのは、ただ「隣国」と語られる モブのための小国の王女だった。

周囲を4つの国に囲まれたシュトルンツ国の 次期女王ブリュンヒルト・ローゼンミュラー・シュトゥッケンシュミット。舌を噛みそうな名前のモブ王女。

モブの小国だけども、大丈夫。周囲の国は、才能あふれるチート級の人間を 追放してくれるのだから。

周囲の国々で追放される悪女や悪役令嬢を集めて、国を繁栄させたい転生王女の物語、開幕！

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.vi: Ba Chị Em Nhà Mikadono Dễ Đối Phó Thật Đấy

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
description.pt-br: Embora Ayase Yuu seja filho de uma atriz renomada e talentosa, ele está abaixo da média em tudo o que faz. Ele é encarregado de viver sob os cuidados de um amigo de sua mãe, e mais tarde descobre que também vai morar com as três irmãs de sua escola que possuem beleza e talento. Embora Yuu pensasse que um entendimento seria impossível de alcançar entre uma pessoa comum e aqueles abençoados com talento, as três irmãs são surpreendentemente...?!

altTitles.ja: マジンサーガ

description.en:
MazinSaga is a manga written and produced by Go Nagai between 1990 and 1998; currently incomplete and up to the sixth volume, it's the summa of Nagai's works, for the complexity of the plot and the treated thematic content.  
Mazinsaga tells the story of the young Koji Kabuto, university student who finds himself having to collect the fruit of the researches of his father, physicist of world-wide reputation who died in mysterious circumstances.  
The boy is thus given a powerful artifact, Mazinger Z, the Armor of God.

altTitles.ja: ゴスロリJK無人島漂流記

description.en: On a school trip, two high school girls fell to the sea and washed up on a deserted island. What are they going to do about about food? And clothes? A cute survival 4koma on a deserted island, except for a mysterious creature.
description.ja: 修学旅行の船旅中に、海に投げ出され、無人島に漂着することになった、女子高生が2名。食べ物はどうする?

altTitles.en: It Seems I Am the "Fated Mate" of the Cold-Blooded Dragon Emperor, but I Plan to Stay Secluded in the Harem

It Seems I Am the "Fated Mate" of the Cold-Blooded Dragon Emperor, but I Plan to Stay Secluded in the Harem: I Am Busy Doting on the Young Dragons, so Please Proceed With the Empress Competition as You Wish

description.en: Upon reaching adulthood, Efinia, the fairy princess, is set to have an audience with the Dragon Emperor. However, as soon as she meets Emperor Glendil, it is revealed that Efinia is his "fated mate." Shocked, Efinia overhears the emperor's heartless words, "It's outrageous that someone who looks like a child is my mate." In that case, fine! I don't desire the love of an arrogant emperor! Undeterred by the harassment from other concubines, Efinia thoroughly enjoys her life in the harem. She eventually befriends a small dragon that wanders into the harem, but it seems this dragon has a secret...
description.ja:
成人の年を迎え、竜族の皇帝に謁見することになった妖精族の王女エフィニア。
しかし皇帝グレンディルに出会った途端、なんとエフィニアが彼の「運命の番」だということが発覚する。
驚くエフィニアだったが「あんな子供みたいなのが番だとは心外だ」という皇帝の心無い言葉を偶然聞いてしまい…。
ならば結構です！傲慢な皇帝の溺愛なんて望みません！
他の側室の嫌がらせにもめげず、エフィニアはのびのびと後宮ライフを満喫。
やがて後宮に迷い込んだ小さな竜とも仲良くなるが、どうもこの竜には秘密があるようで……。

altTitles.ja: 超人X

description.en:
When an airplane goes down in a plume of black smoke near their city, best friends Tokio and Azuma join the volunteer search and rescue team. But instead of a wreck of twisted metal, they discover that the plane suffered minimal damage and that over 200 of the passengers are still alive! With their services no longer needed, the friends head for home, but on the way, they run into an old enemy who has picked up some bizarre new powers and an obsession with destroying them. Now Tokio and Azuma only have one chance to make it out alive—by becoming the superpowered creatures known as choujin!

Being a superpowered creature isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. Tokio has to hide his transformation from his family and dodge a truancy charge at school, all while dealing with an increasing number of odd incidents happening around town!
___
**Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/choujin-x)
description.fr:
En 1998, suite à la multiplication de surhumains appelés “choujin“, le monde a été divisé en provinces autonomes. Cinquante ans après, un crash aérien va changer à tout jamais le destin de la jeune Ely, cultivatrice de “tomeïto“, et impacter le paisible quotidien des lycéens Tokio Kurohara et Azuma Higashi, qui jouent aux justiciers face aux petits malfrats de quartier…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Glénat**
description.hu:
Amikor egy repülőgép lezuhan miközben egy különös, fekete füstöt ereget, a két jó barát Tokio és Azuma úgy dönt, hogy csatlakozik az önkéntes kutató és mentőcsapathoz. Azonban egy csomó roncs helyett azt látják, hogy a repülő minimális károkat szenvedett valamint több mint 200 utas túlélte a balesetet. De mivel nem volt szükség már rájuk így elindulnak hazafelé. Viszont az úton szembejön velük egy régi ellenségük, aki valami bizar erő birtokosa lett, és elakarja pusztítani őket. Tokio és Azuma egyetlen esélye a túlélésre az, hogy szupererővel rendelkező lényekké - Úgy nevezett Choujin-okká válnak.

De a szupererő nem megoldás mindenre. Tokio-nak titokban kell tartania az erejét a családja, és iskolája elől, miközben egyre több különös esemény történik városszerte.
description.ja: 黒煙を上げ墜落していく飛行機が目撃された。それはどうやら“超人”によって引き起こされたものらしい。しかし、不思議なことにその事故は機体の損傷も少なく、何より生存者が「200名」もいた。高校生の黒原トキオと東アヅマは事故処理のボランティアの帰り、因縁の不良にいきなり絡まれるが…いつもと何か様子がちがう――
description.ru:
Азума Хигаши довольно популярный парень. И хотя он не очень крупный, но обладает хорошими боевыми навыками и сильным чувством справедливости. Также он имеет высочайшие оценки в своём классе. Прямая противоположность Азуме его друг Токио Курохара, который не слишком увлечён учёбой. Даже во время драк он выступает как простой наблюдатель. Тем не менее, невзирая на сложности и различия, эти два закадычных приятеля держатся друг друга.
Оба парня живут в префектуре Ямато – самом обычном регионе страны, который более всего известен тем, что некоторые его области были уничтожены Сверхчеловеком.
description.uk:
Азума Хіґаші доволі популярний хлопець: низенький красень із гарними бойовими навичками, має підвищене почуття справедливості, найкращі оцінки у класі та друга… свою повну протилежність - Токіо Курохару, боязкого хлопчака, який лиш спостерігає за бійками Азуми та ловить ґав на уроках. І все ж, не зважаючи на це, міці їхньої дружби можна позаздрити.

Префектура Ямато, район, де вони живуть, наполовину зруйнований Надлюдьми - особами із небезпечними надприродними здібностями. Часто саме вони влаштовують погроми чи сутички, в центрі яких цього разу й опинился хлопці. Перед загрозою смерті друзі приймають рішення стати Надлюдьми. Зміни торкаються Токіо, який вже не може бути стороннім спостерігачем, він потрапляє у пастку світу, де битва неминуча.
description.vi: Một tác phẩm mới được khắc họa dưới ngòi bút của tác giả bộ manga đình đám tokyo ghoul. "Siêu nhân X" kể về thế giới có những nhân vật đặc biệt được gọi là "Siêu nhân"[Choujin], nhân vật chính là Tokio Kurobara, một học sinh trung học ở tỉnh Yamato, hiện tại cậu ấy cùng người bạn Higashi Azuma thực thi công lý.Và rồi một ngày nọ, khi cả hai rơi vào tình thế hiểm nghèo bắt buộc chỉ còn cách dùng một ống tiêm kỳ lạ...
description.es-la: Azuma Higashi es un chico bastante popular. Aunque puede ser algo pequeño, tiene fuertes habilidades de lucha y sus calificaciones son las mejores de su clase. Esto es lo opuesto a Tokio Kurohara, su amigo que no escucha en clase y es simplemente un espectador mientras Azuma pelea. No obstante, el vínculo de estos dos amigos de la infancia es fuerte, sin importar cuán diferentes sean. Los dos viven en la prefectura de Yamato, un distrito increíblemente ordinario con algunas áreas destruidas por Choujin. Los choujin son humanos con poderes sobrenaturales y peligrosos, a menudo la causa de la destrucción circundante. Mientras regresaban a casa, Tokio y Azuma se encuentran con un Choujin, que amenaza con matarlos. Sin posibilidad de escapar, Tokio y Azuma toman una decisión crucial: convertirse en Choujin. Con estos nuevos poderes adquiridos, Tokio ya no puede ser el espectador que alguna vez fue, ahora atrapado en un mundo donde la lucha es inevitable.

description.en: “Chimeras” are people that have been infused with animal DNA in order to give them superpowers and abilities, however society doesn’t favor them so they live in fear and rejection. Our main character, code name “01”, works as a mercenary who happens upon an old acquaintance. He’s then given a job to protect and transport Enoch, a girl who is sought out to be the perfect “material”, to the borders of Canada.
description.fr: Les "chimères" sont des personnes auxquelles on a infusé de l'ADN animal afin de leur donner des superpouvoirs et des capacités, mais la société ne les favorise pas, si bien qu'elles vivent dans la peur et le rejet. Notre personnage principal, dont le nom de code est "01", travaille comme un mercenaire qui tombe sur une vieille connaissance. Il est ensuite chargé de protéger et de transporter Enoch, une fille qui est recherchée pour être le "matériel" parfait, jusqu'aux frontières du Canada.
description.pt: “Quimeras” são pessoas que foram infundidas com DNA animal para receber superpoderes e habilidades, mas a sociedade os despreza e vivem marginalizados. Nosso protagonista, codinome “01”, trabalha como um mercenário e recebe a missão de proteger e levar Enoch, o “material” perfeito, à fronteira do Canadá.

altTitles.ja: 宝石の国

description.az: Cəvahiratlar ölkəsi (Houseki no Kuni), meteoritlərin altı dəfə Yerə düşdüyü və bu prosesdə onu məhv etdiyi uzaq gələcəkdə baş verir. Demək olar ki, bütün canlılar məhv oldu, qalan bütün torpaqlar tək bir sahilə çevrildi. Çox uzun zaman dilimləri ərzində həsas həyat forması olan yeni bir irq yarandı; insan şəklini alan ölməz zinət əşyaları. Fosfofillit (Phos) zəifdir (ən aşağı sərtliklərdən birinə malikdir) və həmyaşıdları tərəfindən yararsız hesab edilir. Phos'a təbiət tarixinin ensiklopediyasını yaratmaq tapşırığı verildikdən sonra o, uzaq, lakin müdrik həmkarı Kinovarın (Cinnabar) köməyinə müraciət edir, beləliklə onların dostluğu və şəxsi inkişafı başlayır. Eyni zamanda “Cəvahirat camaatı” onun dəbdəbəli dəyərindən yararlanmaq istəyən Aydan gələnlərlə (aylılarla) müharibə aparır.
description.en: In the distant future, a new life form called Houseki (gems) are born. The 28 Houseki must fight against the moon dwellers who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each gem is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the moon dwellers, Phos is a gem who is given no assignment until the gems' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.

description.en: Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ja: 「好き」っていいたい！いわれたい！中学卒業式に100回目の失恋をした愛城恋太郎は、高校でこそ初めての彼女を！と願う。そんな彼の前に現れた恋の神様が告げた未来は「高校生活で出会う“運命の人”は100人。しかし彼女達は、幸せになれなければなんやかんや（中略）あって…死ぬ」　突然始まるDEAD OR LOVEな純愛ハーレムライフ!!　絶対に脱落しない・させない！
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

altTitles.en: My House is a Magic Power Spot: Just by Living there I Become the Strongest in the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

description.en: Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!
description.ja: 自宅でのんびりすることが、最強への近道だった――。強力な魔力スポットの上に建つ一軒家に住んでいた普通の青年ダイチ。 ある日、それを狙うやつらに家ごと異世界に召喚されてしまう!!　だが、長年魔力スポットに住み続け、魔力が貯めこまれたダイチは敵を一蹴！　さらにかわいい我が家の精霊サクラも現れて至れり尽くせり！　最強の魔力を持ったダイチが望むものはただ一つ――それは自宅で平穏に暮らすこと！
description.ru:
Жить беззаботно в своём доме — это, несомненно, великолепно. Но мой дом — самое большое в мире место волшебной силы. Каким-то образом вышло так, что меня с моим домом перенесло в другой мир. Выяснилось, что меня призвали какие-то парни, которые хотели присвоить магию моего дома себе. Тем не менее, я живу в этом месте в течение многих лет, и мое тело, по-видимому, аномально переполнено магией. Из-за каких-то непредвиденных обстоятельств те ребята, которые меня вызвали, быстро убежали. Как бы то ни было, все ещё есть невоспитанные люди, которые жаждут магии, просачивающейся из моего дома. Я не отдам свой дом никому! Я буду использовать свою силу, как захочу!   

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5915da/) (Raw)
description.es-la: Vivir sin preocupaciones en casa es el mejor atajo: mi casa es el mayor punto de poder mágico del mundo. Siendo ese el caso, tanto mi casa como yo fuimos invocados a otro mundo. Sin embargo, he estado viviendo en este lugar durante muchos años y aparentemente mi cuerpo está desbordado magia. Debido a circunstancias imprevistas por parte de los tipos que me invocaron, huyeron rápidamente. Como sea, todavía hay algunas personas mal educadas que codician la magia que escapa de mi casa. ¡No voy a ceder mi casa a esas personas! ¡Voy a ejercer mi poder como me plazca!
description.pt-br: Viver despreocupado em casa é a melhor coisa... minha casa é o maior ponto de força mágica do mundo. Sendo esse o caso, tanto minha casa quanto eu fomos convocados para outro mundo por algumas pessoas que estavam visado isso. No entanto, eu moro neste lugar há muitos anos e meu corpo está, aparentemente, transbordando de forma anormal com a magia. Devido a algumas circunstâncias imprevistas por aquelas pessoas que me chamaram, elas rapidamente fugiram. Seja como for, ainda há algumas pessoas mal-educadas que cobiçam a magia que vaza da minha casa. Eu não vou desistir da minha casa para essas pessoas! Vou usar meu poder como quiser!

description.en: New Chronicles of Goguryeo In a world unfolding within my dreams, It was the late Goguryeo period, And I became Yeon Namsaeng, son of Yeon Gaesomun. In reality, I am Kim Namsaeng…

altTitles.ja: 魔物喰らいの冒険者

description.en: Rude is an adventurer who makes a living by collecting medicinal herbs in dungeons filled with miasma, relying on his unique skill of “abnormal status nullification.” Because of this, other adventurers avoid him because he smells like miasma, and he cannot form a party, so he is derided as a “miasma diver.” Then, a new labyrinth is discovered, and Rude is invited to join a party that needs him as a baggage carrier. In order to change the situation, he challenges the labyrinth. However, after encountering a powerful monster in the labyrinth, the adventurers who accompanied him betray Rude and are abandoned as a decoy… After a life-or-death battle with the monster, he is injured, loses all his supplies, and is in a desperate situation. With the monster’s corpse lying before him, Rude tries to survive by gambling on the forbidden “monster food”… The more he eats, the stronger he becomes. This is the start of an exciting gourmet adventure fantasy!
description.ja: 「状態異常無効化」というユニークスキルを頼りに、瘴気で満ちるダンジョンで薬草を採取して生計を立てている冒険者のルード。それ故に他の冒険者達からは瘴気臭いと避けられパーティーを組む事も出来きず、「瘴気漁り」という蔑称で蔑まれる毎日。そんな時、新たな迷宮が見つかり、荷物持ちとして必要としてくれるパーティーに誘われたルードは、現状を変えるべくこの迷宮に挑戦する。だが、迷宮の中で強力な魔物と遭遇したことで、同行した冒険者たちはルードを裏切り、囮として見捨てられるのだった…。魔物との死闘を経て、怪我をし、物資も失い、絶体絶命の極限状況に陥ったルードは、目の前に横たわる魔物の死体を前に、生き延びるために禁断の〝魔物食″に賭けてみるが──…。喰えば喰うほど強くなる、痛快グルメ冒険ファンタジー開幕!!

title.en: Putting My Life on the Line, I Go All-in on Luck Enhancement

altTitles.ja: 人生かけて運強化に全振り

altTitles.en: Maxing Out Luck: The Ultimate Life Reroll
Spending My Whole Life Improving My Luck

description.en:
Amano Kyouhei was a man abandoned by luck, but after hitting rock bottom, his fate finally begins to change. After a video of him defeating a monster goes viral on the internet, he becomes famous overnight.
This sudden reversal of fortune leads Kyouhei on a lifechanging journey of unforetold adventures. Will this stroke of luck bring him to true fortune, or will he face new trials to overcome…? The answer to that question will be found in his upcoming journey!

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

altTitles.en: The weirdo one desk over keeps giving me THAT kind of look

altTitles.ur: Sath ki kursi par beithne wali mujhe "Un Ankhoñ" se deikhti he

description.en: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

description.en: A place where you casually use blood or ma in your name, I lived in Murim for 7 years. I was miserable, and I did a lot of dirty things. But I had to do anything to survive. That's 'Nangin' Finally, I crossed the line and experienced death in a desire to become stronger. But when I opened my eyes, it was modern. The world has changed and we are connected to the fantasy world of Pangea?! And as a returner with the only class? Let's scratch the lottery tickets!
description.id: Tempat di mana Anda dengan santai menggunakan darah atau ma atas nama Anda, saya tinggal di Murim selama 7 tahun. Saya sengsara, dan saya melakukan banyak hal kotor. Tapi aku harus melakukan apapun untuk bertahan hidup. Itulah 'Nangin' Akhirnya, saya melewati batas dan mengalami kematian dalam keinginan untuk menjadi lebih kuat. Tapi ketika saya membuka mata saya, itu modern. Dunia telah berubah dan kita terhubung dengan dunia fantasi Pangaea?! Dan sebagai pengembalian dengan satu-satunya kelas? Mari gores tiket lotere!

altTitles.ja: ペンと手錠と事実婚

altTitles.en: A Pen, Cuffs, & a De Fact-o Marriage
Pen, Cuffs, & a De Facto Marriage

altTitles.vi: Hôn thú giữa bút và còng tay

description.en: A middle-aged detective, Eiji Kirisame (40), meets a strange high school girl at the scene of a certain crime. She doesn't speak a word, but she helps solve the case using her drawings. However, suddenly this middle-aged detective is getting a marriage proposal from this girl!
description.ja: 中年刑事、切鮫鋭二(40)は、とある事件現場で声を出さない不思議な女子高生、梔子鶫に出会う。 事件の真相をド下手な絵で次々に明らかにしていく鶫に驚く切鮫だったが、突然、鶫から求婚されて―――？
description.vi: Kirisame Eiji, một cảnh sát luôn tận tâm với công việc quá mức đến nỗi không được lòng các đồng nghiệp của mình. Kuchinashi Tsugumi, một nữ sinh trung học kỳ lạ tuyệt chỉ giao tiếp bằng cây bút và quyển tập phác thảo của mình.Trong lúc Kirisame đang gặp bế tắc trong một vụ án mạng mà đồng nghiệp anh ai cũng cho rằng chỉ là một vụ tự sát, Tsugumi đã liên tiếp cho anh vô số lời gợi ý bằng những nét vẽ nguệch ngoạc của mình.Cuối vụ án, ngay vào lúc tính mạng của Tsugumi bị hung thủ đe doạ, Kirisame đã kịp thời cứu cô và bắt giữ tên tội phạm.Những tưởng mọi thứ đã xong Kirisame cảm thấy nhẹ nhõm, nhưng ngay sau đó, Tsugumi bất ngờ cầu hôn anh!?!?

altTitles.ja: 飛雷刀

description.en:
A young orphan was alone in the world until he meets the master of a secret form of martial arts. To learn these otherworldly techniques, he will need to endure years of his sadistic teacher’s grueling and weird training. But why does he have to do laundry, cook meals, or play instruments to learn martial arts anyway?! If he can survive long enough (and if his massive ego doesn’t get in the way), he just might be able to wield the unstoppable lightning knives. Will he make the cut or be sliced down to size?

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%84%EB%A2%B0%EB%8F%84/2355)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/52248)
description.ja:
5歳の時母親が亡くなり、10歳の時伝染病で父親まで亡くなった少年「飛雲」。彼は彫刻家だった父からその才能を受け継いでいた。 両親の木像を作り、二人の墓の前にそなえたある日、それを見た老人から「自分を師匠にすれば天下一の武術を教えよう」と話しかけられる。怪しいとは思ったものの老人が見せた武術に惹かれその申し出を受けてしまった飛雲。案の定、武術などろくに教えず、訓練といいながら家事と金稼ぎばかり… そんなある日、女装して働いている酒楼で偶然武林盟主の娘である「羅 香凜」の命を救った。飛雲は男であることを隠して香凜と親しくなるが…

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%84%EB%A2%B0%EB%8F%84/2355)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/52248)
description.ko:
홀로 길러주신 아버지를 돌림병으로 잃고 10세의 어린 나이에 혈혈단신이 된 비류연.
조각가였던 아버지에게 배운 기술로 부모님의 조각상을 만들어 두 분의 묘 앞에 세워두는데,
지나가던 노인이 그걸 보더니 자신을 사부로 삼으면 천하제일 무공을 가르쳐주겠다고 한다.

수상쩍지만 달리 갈 곳도 없고, 그럴듯해 보이는 무공에 혹해 비류연은 그를 따라가고 마는데…

그날 이후 비류연을 길러준 것은 팔할이 바람이었다.

오늘 하루는 좀 편안했으면 좋겠다는 바람!
사부가 더 늙으면 울 때까지 구박해주겠다는 바람!
아니 다 필요 없고 여기서 탈출하고 싶다는 바람!
하늘이여 저한테 왜 이러세요 제발 살려주세요… 하는 바람!

하늘이 비류연의 바람을 들어준 것일까.
무식한 가사노동과 피골상접 과로사를 야기할 것 같던 돈벌이로 점철된 삶 속에서
깨알같이 사부 몰래 힘을 비축하던 비류연은 드디어 어느 날 깨닫는다.

‘오늘이 바로 그날이다!’

사부를 따돌릴 꿀떡(?)을 던져놓고는 무한한 용기를 발휘해 묵금과 비뢰도까지 다 들고 튄 비류연.

혹자는 강호를 두고 시산혈해 위에 암투로 쌓아올린 백척간두의 세계라고 하나,
비류연에겐 드넓은 꿀 천지에 온실 속의 화초들이 노니는 안락한 신세계로만 보였는데…!

비류연의 행복은 과연 언제까지 갈 것인가!

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/52248)
description.ru:
В 10 лет Би Рю Ён становится сиротой, потеряв последнего родственника, своего отца.

Будучи хорошим сыном и отличным подмастерьем весьма талантливого ремесленника, он решает соорудить две прекрасные статуи в память о своих родителях. Так, когда работа была практически завершена, к нему неожиданно обратился некий старый мастер, пожелав стать наставником парня, и обещая обучить самому могущественному искусству во всей Поднебесной.

Жажда до силы превозмогает сомнения. И он решает последовать за стариком… 

С этого момента... жизнь круто изменилась. Невыносимые тренировки и серьезные наказания следовали по пятам день за днём! Иногда казалось, труд настолько изматывал мальчика, что кожа прилипала к костям, а смерть от переутомления уже маячила на горизонте. Много раз Рю Ён хотел бросить всё и покинуть наставника. Возгласы, «О Небо, за что мне всё это?! Кто-нибудь, спасите меня!» - не сходили с его уст. Но Небеса оставались безмолвны.

И вот, в один из множества преисполненных изнеможением и страданиями дней, когда сил осталось с кунжутное зёрнышка, он понял: «Это оно!»

Сегодня Рю Ён превзойдёт своего учителя и узнает, что такое "Меч разящего грома".

---

altTitles.ja: れんげとなると！

description.en: It's been a few months since the neighborhood Chinese restaurant closed down, and when I stopped by for the first time in a while, I found that it had been transformed into a flashy, mysterious restaurant with its old signboard still intact. When I went inside, there was a gal there...
description.ja: 近所の町中華が閉店して数カ月、久々に立ち寄るとそこはかつての看板のまま、ド派手な謎の店に変わっていた。中に入るとそこには1人のギャルがいて……。ギャルがもてなす町中華の物語だ。
description.pt-br: Já se passaram alguns meses desde o fechamento do restaurante chinês do bairro, e quando passei por lá pela primeira vez em um tempo, descobri que ele tinha se transformado em um restaurante chamativo e misterioso, mantendo ainda seu antigo letreiro. Ao entrar, deparei-me com uma garçonete... Esta é uma história sobre um restaurante em Chinatown onde as garçonetes são acolhedoras.

title.en: Sekai o Horobosu Majo o Sodatemasu!!

altTitles.en: Let's Raise a Witch Who Will Destroy the World

altTitles.ja: 世界を滅ぼす魔女を育てます!!

description.en: Takeru, a “Nurturer,” who was born into a family that trains monsters. To make money, he accepts requests from the Demon King and works hard to raise vicious monsters. One night, a wounded witch visits him and asks him to train Anna, a young girl. In fact, Anna is the last survivor of a legendary witch family… Will a bond be formed between Anna, whose ultimate goal is to destroy the world, and Takeru, the best “Nurturer” in the demon world? What will become of the world?

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

altTitles.ja: ミスミさんは見透かせない

description.en: A romantic comedy about Yuri Tsuguto, who has clairvoyance but isn’t good at it, and Misumi Mitsuhashi, a girl who likes strange things. One day, when Yuri looks at Misumi’s back, he notices that her jacket is transparent and behind it is the message “If anyone can read this, come to the astronomy clubroom after school.” When he goes to the clubroom and explains his clairvoyance ability, Misumi becomes excited and asks “Why don’t you let me study you?”
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Yuri Tsuguto, que tem clarividência, mas não é bom nisso, e Misumi Mitsuhashi, uma garota que gosta de coisas estranhas. Um dia, quando Yuri olha para as costas de Misumi, ele percebe que sua jaqueta é transparente e atrás dela está a mensagem "Se alguém puder ler isso, venha para a sala do clube de astronomia depois da escola." Quando ele vai para a sala do clube e explica sua habilidade de clarividência, Misumi fica animada e pergunta "Por que você não me deixa estudar você?"

altTitles.ja: 魔導剣聖ー伝説の帰還ー

altTitles.en: Legendary Return of the Magic Sword Saint

description.en: The hero who holds both the strongest title in magic, “Mage,” and the strongest title in swordsmanship, “Sword Saint,” returns to a world 1000 years after becoming a legendary figure!! Balua Westgarden, the “Magic Sword Saint” who once mastered both magic and swordsmanship and etched his name at the pinnacle of human history, challenged the absolute demon king Giranher in a decisive battle for the survival of humanity. However, due to the interference of mysterious forces, both Balua and Giranher lost their lives. For 1000 years, Balua’s soul was bound to the world by regret for dying halfway through his journey. But when Direa Westgarden, a boy who admired the Magic Sword Saint, was attacked by monsters and left on the brink of death, Balua returned to the mortal world by borrowing his body.

altTitles.ja: 後藤さんは振り向かせたい

altTitles.en: Gotou-san Wants Me to Turn Around

altTitles.fr: Gotou-san veut que je me retourne

altTitles.es: Gotou-san Quiere Que me Dé la Vuelta.

description.en: Gotou-san, the prettiest girl in school, tries to get the attention of Maeda-kun, who sits in front of her. She secretly harbors a crush on him, but Maeda, who lacks self-confidence, doesn't notice her feelings. What is the future of Gotou-san's unwavering love?
description.es: La chica más guapa de la escuela, Gotou-san, siempre está tonteando con Maeda-kun, el chico sentado frente a ella. Ella está secretamente enamorada de él, pero Maeda-kun, que es inseguro de sí mismo, no entiende sus intenciones.
description.fr: Gotou-san, la plus jolie fille de l'école, demande quelque chose à Maeda-kun devant lui. Gotou-san l'aime secrètement, mais Maeda, qui ne lui fait pas confiance, ne la remarque pas.Quel est l'avenir de l'amour indéfectible de Gotou-san ?
description.ja:
その恋心に気付いてほしい！

学校一の美少女・後藤さんは前の席の前田くんになにかとちょっかいをかけてくる。そこには後藤さんの秘めたる恋心があるのだが、自分に自信のない前田君にはその意図は全く伝わらない。果たして後藤さんの一途な恋の行く末は？

description.en: To meet his dead parents again, Hong Bin made a deal with the Baseball Fairy, who agreed to return him to the past if he achieved 3,000 career hits as a baseball player. And at the age of 40, Bin the baseball legend hits his last ball and goes back in time. After reuniting with his family, Bin decides to pursue his old dream of joining the major league. The only issue is that he's lost all his old skills as a pro! But will his past experiences be enough to help this legend fulfill his new goal?

altTitles.th: เลเวลอัปไปกับเทพเจ้า

altTitles.ja: 神と共にレベルアップ

altTitles.pt-br: Subindo De Nível Com Os Deuses

description.en:
“Maybe Inner Gods can never defeat Outer Gods…” so thought Yuwon Kim, a plucky, high-ranking warrior, after a bitter defeat.

But Yuwon is too tenacious to give up. His loss becomes the dawn of a new journey as a returnee. With renewed determination, Yuwon starts back from where he began, smashing monster after monster and relearning his skills before taking on the Tower once again.

But can he fight his way through the tutorials and level up once more, or will his conquest crumble before him?

description.ja:
異界の神、アウターゴッドと呼ばれる存在が支配する世界。一番最後に塔へ入り一番最後までインナーゴッドたちと共に戦った人間、神野 流星。 そんな彼も結局はアウターゴッドに破れてしまう。 越えられない壁に絶望を感じていた最後の瞬間、時間を司る神であるクロノスから新たにチャンスが与えられる。 そうして彼は、前世の記憶を持ったまま過去へ回帰することに――。 再び塔を登り、力と仲間を手に入れた神野は、今度こそアウターゴッドに勝つことができるだろうか？不滅の神話に挑む人間の物語が今始まる！

description.ko:
이계의 신, 아우터 갓(Outer God).

하늘을 닫는 절망과 늪에 빠진 좌절, 탄생하지 못한 자, 어리석은 혼돈.
평범한 사람들은 그저 바라보는 것만으로 목숨을 잃어 버릴 그 존재들이 세상을 휘젓는 지금…
수 년간의 싸움 끝에, 최후의 생존자들이 낸 결론.

"이너(Inner)는 아우터(Outer)를 이길 수 없다."

그 순간, 시간을 다루는 신격을 지닌 존재 크로노스는 자신을 희생시켜 시계태엽을 되돌린다.

"이길 수 없겠지. 지금은 말이야."

"옛 세계선으로 돌아가라. 그리고 다시 시작해."

모든 신들에게 지목을 받아 과거로 돌아간 최후의 1인.
가장 뒤늦게 탑을 올라, 가장 마지막까지 신들과 함께 싸운 인간, 김유원.

"이너(Inner)는 아우터(Outer)를 이길 수 없다. 그렇다면…"

"이기는 건 나야."

그는 마지막 순간을 함께하던 동료들을 다시 모아,
아우터와의 싸움을 승리로 끝낼 수 있을까?

description.ru:
Он был храбрейшим и сильнейшим из всех, но даже его в самом конце ожидало лишь отчаяние. В последние мгновения ему был дан еще один шанс. Благодаря жертве бога времени «Хроноса» его судьба еще не была предрешена. Вернувшись в прошлое, он снова попытается взобраться на «Башню» со своим непревзойденным талантом, чтобы побороть древнее зло, которое грозит уничтожить этот мир.

description.th:
"อินเนอร์อย่างพวกเราไม่สามารถเอาชนะเอาเตอร์ได้"

เมื่อแรงเกอร์ในหอคอยลงความเห็นเป็นเสียงเดียวกัน
'คิมยูวอน' มนุษย์ผู้แกร่งกล้าเพียงหนึ่งเดียวในหมู่เทพเจ้า
จึงถูกเลือกให้ย้อนกลับมายังอดีตเพื่อเริ่มต้นทุกอย่างใหม่อีกครั้ง

เขาจะสามารถทำตามแผนที่ทุกคนช่วยกันวางไว้
และแกร่งขึ้นกว่าเดิมจนกลับไปเอาชนะ 'เอาเตอร์ก็อด'

外界之神来袭，人间陷入了排山倒海般的绝望之中，生灵涂炭……而当内界众神在经过了数年的苦苦战斗后，也最终以战败收场。 在战死前的最后时刻，希腊神克洛诺斯牺牲了自己，重新开启了时间之门。 而众神最后选择了金幽元，这个队伍中唯一的人类，让他回到过去，重新将众神凝聚。

description.pt-br:
“Talvez os Deuses Internos nunca possam derrotar os Deuses Exteriores…”, pensou Yuwon Kim, um guerreiro corajoso e de alto escalão, após uma derrota amarga.

Mas Yuwon é tenaz demais para desistir. Sua perda se torna o início de uma nova jornada como repatriado. Com determinação renovada, Yuwon recomeça de onde começou, destruindo monstro após monstro e reaprendendo suas habilidades antes de enfrentar a Torre mais uma vez.

Mas ele conseguirá abrir caminho através dos tutoriais e subir de nível mais uma vez, ou sua conquista desmoronará diante dele?

title.en: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei LoveCome

altTitles.ja: 英雄と魔女の転生ラブコメ

altTitles.ja-ro: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei Rabu Kome

altTitles.en: A Reincarnation Romantic Comedy of a Hero and a Witch

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Comédia Romântica de Reencarnação entre um Herói e uma Feiticeira

altTitles.vi: Chuyện tình lãng mạn và hài hước của Anh Hùng và Phù Thủy chuyển sinh
Chuyện tình chuyển sinh hài hước của Anh hùng và Phù thuỷ

description.en: Choose the world or choose her. Ordinary high school student Shiraishi Godo harbored a "secret"  - he possessed memories of a past life. In a world different from this one, he was a "hero" who saved humanity. However, that was a story of his past life. In this life, he was supposed to lead an ordinary school life—until the arrival of transfer student Mai Shiina turned everything upside down.
description.ja: 世界を選ぶか、彼女を選ぶか。平凡な高校生・白石護道には『秘密』があった。それは前世の記憶を持っていること。こことは違う別の世界で、人類を救った『英雄』だった。とはいえ、あくまで前世の話。今世ではごく普通の学生生活――のはずだったが、転入してきた少女・椎名麻衣の出現で日々は一変する。
description.vi:
Shiraishi Godou, một cậu học sinh cao trung bình thường đang có một "Bí mật". Đó là cậu vẫn còn ký ức của tiền thế.
Ở một thế giới khác, Godou đã từng là "Anh hùng" giải cứu nhân loại. Tuy là vậy, nhưng đó là chuyện của tiền thế. Ở thế giới hiện tại, cậu chắc là đang trải qua quãng đời học sinh bình thường, vậy mà sự xuất hiện của cô thiếu nữ vừa chuyển trường đến. Shiina Mai đã làm những ngày yên bình của cậu hoàn toàn thay đổi
description.pt-br: O estudante comum de ensino médio Shiraishi Godo guardava um "segredo", ele possuía memórias de uma vida passada. Em um mundo diferente deste, ele foi um "herói" que salvou a humanidade. Mas isso era uma história de sua vida passada. Nesta vida, Godo deveria ter uma vida escolar comum. Isso até a chegada da nova aluna Mai Shiina, que virou tudo de cabeça para baixo. Ela não era apenas uma aluna transferida. Mai era a reencarnação de Celis, a Feiticeira da Calamidade, sua mortal inimiga de vidas passadas. E ela estava lá, não por vingança, mas por algo mais — algo que mudaria o curso da vida de Godo mais uma vez. Agora, ele deve navegar pelas complexidades de suas memórias reencarnadas, sua crescente conexão com Mai e a escolha impossível entre uma vida pacífica e uma cheia de caos mágico.

altTitles.id: ทรินิตี้เซเว่น 7 จ้าวคัมภีร์เวท

altTitles.ja: トリニティセブン 7人の魔書使い

description.en: Everyday is a normal day in the small town where Kasuga Arata lives. However, everything changed on the day of the Black Sun, and following it, a magician appears before him. The Black Sun caused the Breakdown Phenomenon which destroyed the town where he lives. Because of this, his normal life was artificially reconstructed by a Grimoire that his childhood friend had left. Just what is the purpose of the magician coming to the town? What will he do with the Grimoire's keepsake?
description.pt-br:
Arata Kasuga está vivendo uma vida comum com sua prima, Hijiri, quando um acontecimento misterioso chamado "Fenômeno do Colapso" a faz desaparecer diante de seus olhos. Determinado a erradicar o Fenômeno do Colapso e trazer Hijiri de volta, Arata se matricula na Academia Real Biblia. É uma estrada difícil pela frente, mas nada é impossível quando você tem sete lindas garotas — cada uma mestre em sua própria arte mágica — ao seu lado! A comédia romântica e a história às vezes séria da escola de bruxas começa!

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 30. ]

altTitles.ja: モスクワ2160

description.en:
A future where the cold war between the USA and Russia never ended and has been going on for two centuries. 
"Liquidator" Daniel Kuragin runs through Moscow alleyways for score-settling with a submachine gun in hand!  
The overwhelmingly popular web series from "Goblin Slayer" creator Kumo Kagyu has begun publication.
description.ru: Холодная война так и не закончилась, и мир совсем забыл о том, что такое правда, свобода и надежда. Среди промышляющих в советской Москве кибернетизированных бандитов затесался «уборщик» Данила Курагин с целёхоньким телом, действующий сам по себе.
description.pt-br: A história se passa em um mundo onde a Guerra Fria já se estendeu por mais de 2 séculos e a tecnologia evoluiu de forma a criar “sombras mecanizadas”, cujo os objetivos são trabalhar como limpadores em um mundo repleto de conspirações.

altTitles.ja: 裏でやんちゃな剛院田さん

description.en:
Bonsuke Hirano, an exceptionally ordinary high school boy, returns to his homeroom after school to pick something up, only to find the school's number-one serene beauty, Kokuru Goinda, fidgeting around in his desk...

"Huh? Does she...like me? Wait, maybe not?"
description.ja: ある日の放課後、忘れ物を取りに教室に戻ると先輩ギャルの『剛院田さん』が僕の机を見てモジモジ顔を赤らめていた…。「センパイ、もしかして僕のこと好き……いや違う??」ゴーインで、優しくて、なんかエッチな彼女。告白されそうでされない“思わせぶりな告白もどき”は僕の純情をいたずらに弄んできて―――！
description.es-la: Después de la escuela, cuando Hirano, un chico ordinario de secundaria, regresa al salón de clases para recoger algo que olvidó, encuentra a Gouinda-san, la chica más genial de la escuela, inquieta frente a su escritorio... “Puede que le guste a esta niña… ¿No, no?” ¡Está a punto de comenzar un estimulante juego de amor juvenil, donde las chicas hermosas juegan con los corazones puros, ya sea que se confiesen o no!

altTitles.ja: バーフウラーズ

description.en: I am 30 years old, jobless and in despair, when I was invited to become a "Girls Bar Manager." So I entered the world of urban nightlife, and what awaited me was a very cute cast of girls. However, the owner had an ironclad rule for me: "Never touch any of the bar girls." I wonder if I will be able to stick to the rule...... This adult-themed romantic comedy takes place in a girls bar, a place of relaxation for gentlemen!

title.en: Sacrificial Princess and the King of Beasts

altTitles.ja: 贄姫と獣の王
Nie-hime to Kemono no Ou
Niehime to Kemono no Oh

altTitles.en: Princess of the Sacrifice & King of the Beast

altTitles.de: Sacrifice to the King of Beasts

altTitles.it: La principessa sacrificio i el re delle bestie

description.en: Saliphie, the 99th sacrifice to the terrifying demon king, learns two secrets about the king: The first, that he has been letting the sacrifices go in secret. The second, that half of his blood is that of a human. She gets to know the king's kindness and sorrow, and then it's announced that the king has taken Saliphie, who wishes to become a source of energy for the king, as his queen, and…?
description.pt-br:
Localizado no fim do mundo, o Reino de Ozmargo é habitado por feras de todas as formas e feitios, governado por um temível rei sem nome. Após o fim de uma guerra de cem anos entre Ozmargo e o reino humano vizinho, um tratado de paz foi assinado: todo ano, um sacrifício deve ser enviado para ser devorado pelo rei na noite da revelação.

Sariphi é o 99º e mais recente sacrifício humano. Embora pareça frágil, ela não teme o rei nem tem uma família ou um lar para onde retornar caso consiga escapar de sua morte iminente. Intrigado pela garota audaciosa, o rei deixa Sariphi vagar pelo palácio, apesar da desaprovação de seu conselheiro, Anúbis.

Aos poucos, o rei e Sariphi começam a se aquecer um com o outro, mas a noite da revelação está se aproximando rapidamente. Sem que eles saibam, o dia fatídico desencadeia uma série de eventos que mudarão o curso do destino não apenas de Sariphi e do rei, mas também de seus respectivos mundos.

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランド オーダー－モルターリス：ステラ－

description.en: The official adaptation of the TYPE-MOON phenomenon that has become one of the most popular mobile games in the world! The year is 2016, and glitches found in humanity’s past threaten the sustainability of its future. The Chaldea Security Organization - tasked with preserving human history for as long and as strongly as possible - has developed a new method of time travel to repair these events, stabilizing humanity’s future. But when an unknown threat pushes mankind to the brink of extinction, young recruits Mash Kyrielight and Ritsuka Fujimaru find themselves at the helm of the rescue mission: Obtain the Holy Grail in a face off against fate itself …
description.id:
Tahun 2016, dan gangguan yang ditemukan di masa lalu umat manusia mengancam keberlanjutan masa depannya. Organisasi Keamanan Chaldea–yang bertugas melestarikan sejarah manusia selama dan sekuat mungkin–telah mengembangkan metode baru perjalanan waktu untuk memperbaiki peristiwa ini, menstabilkan masa depan umat manusia. Tetapi ketika ancaman yang tidak diketahui mendorong umat manusia ke ambang kepunahan, rekrutan muda Mash Kyrielight dan Ritsuka Fujimaru menemukan diri mereka di pucuk pimpinan misi penyelamatan. Dapatkan Cawan Suci dalam menghadapi takdir itu sendiri… Adaptasi resmi dari TYPE-MOON fenomena yang telah menjadi salah satu game mobile paling populer di dunia!

Holy Grail War seorang gadis dan pemuda dimulai! Mash Kyrielight yang berafiliasi dengan Organisasi Pelindung Umat Manusia, Chaldea, bergabung dalam misi melindungi sejarah umat manusia. Di hari yang sama, dia bertemu dengan seorang pemuda bernama Ritsuka Fujimaru yang tertidur di ruang istirahat..?

Didistribusi di Indonesia oleh [Gramedia](https://www.gramedia.com/products/fategrand-order-mortalis-stella-01)
description.ru: Альтернативная манга-адаптация основных сюжетных актов игры Fate/Grand Order. Покрывает акты Фуюки, Орлеан, Септем, Лондон, Камелот. Повествование ведется от лица Маш.

altTitles.ja: 空をまとって

description.en:
Haro Ogawa, a high school student, is also a self-taught oil painter who is trying to paint the ultimate nude. 
After an unexpected encounter with an elusive "witch", he sets his sights on applying to art school... 
The mystery that resides in the human body, the ultimate "beauty", will be painted on canvas! 
A skin-colored coming-of-age drama!
description.ja: 「俺もいつかこんなヌードを描きたい――」　幼少時に見た絵画、「魔女のヌード」に魅入られた高校生・小川波路（おがわはろ）。日々、独学でヌードを描く彼の前に現れたのは、「魔女のヌード」に描かれた女性に瓜二つの美女、神生伶だった。ハロは思わず、伶にヌードモデルになってほしいと頼みこむが…!?　目指すはヌードで藝大合格!!

altTitles.ja: ドラマクイン

description.en: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.id: Setelah menyelamatkan Bumi, para alien tinggal bersama manusia di Jepang. Nomamoto, seorang pekerja pabrik dengan bos alien yang kejam, suatu hari bertemu dengan Kitami, yang mengatakan bahwa keluarganya sendiri dibunuh oleh alien. Keduanya dengan cepat menjalin persahabatan, tetapi suatu hari Kitami melakukan hal yang tidak terpikirkan...
description.ja: <毎週月曜更新>宇宙人が地球を救ってから、人間と宇宙人が共に住むようになった日本。工場で宇宙人の上司にこき使われるノマモトは、家族を宇宙人に殺されたという北見と出会う。仲を深める2人だが、ある日北見がとんでもないことをしてしまい…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.uk: Після порятунку Землі прибульцями, Японія стала спільним домом для них та людей. Номото, яка змушена терпіти знущання від свого боса-прибульця на заводі, зустрічає Кітамі, чиє серце розбите втратою сім'ї, вбитої прибульцями. Між ними виникає щира дружба, яка переходить до здійснення їх бажань... винищення всіх прибульців...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

title.en: I'm Being Mistaken for a Soccer Genius

description.en: The Korean boy, Lee Jian, who was released from a prestigious youth team in Italy, spends his days idling away as a substitute even after arriving at the youth team of AC Firenze, almost as if he were running away.As usual, he boasts to his childhood friend, Kim Jiwoo, claiming to be a genius, but then he hears the shocking news that Jiwoo is coming to Italy to study abroad. Determined not to disappoint his precious (?) friend Jiwoo, Jian sets his sights on becoming a starter...

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ja: この世界において魔法とは生き物である。そして困難な試練を乗り越え、魔法を習得するハンターたちを人は「魔女」と呼ぶ。ある日、辺境の山奥で恐るべき王の魔法（キング・ウロロ）と最強の魔女が激闘を繰り広げていた。しかしそこへ、場違いな一人の少年が乱入する。彼の名はイチ。魔女とも魔法とも縁の無い山暮らしの狩人が世界の常識をひっくり返す！
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
description.ru: Пробравшись на невольничий корабль, Юлиан отправляется на континент вместе с сотней рабов, жаждущих свободы... Но что ждёт его впереди?!
description.vi: Lén đi lậu trên một con tàu, Julian ra đi tìm đến đại lục cùng với một trăm người nô lệ khác... Ai ai cũng khao khát có được tự do, thế nhưng rồi...?!

title.en: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper no Jikenbo

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ奇譚 ジャック・ザ・リッパーの事件簿

altTitles.en: The Jack the Ripper Case Files
Record of Ragnarok: The Jack the Ripper Case Files

altTitles.ru: Повесть о Конце Света: Досье Джека-потрошителя

altTitles.en: Record of Ragnarok Curious Tale: The Jack the Ripper Case Files

description.en:
In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0212)
description.ja: 『終末のワルキューレ』第4回戦人類代表ジャック・ザ・リッパー。霧の都ロンドンを、恐怖のどん底に落とし、人類が応援することさえ躊躇した狂喜の殺人紳士に隠された真実とは？

altTitles.ja: ピープ

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.

title.en: The Reincarnated Assassin Is a Swordmaster

altTitles.es-la: El asesino reencarnado es un genio de la espada

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Assassin is a Genius Swordsman

description.en:
Raon was once a loyal assassin for House Robert until Derus killed him. Not willing to give up, Raon prayed for vengeance and woke as a member of House Sieghart, the most powerful noble house!

He’ll need all of their near-infinite resources to get revenge. Though he carried over knowledge of a powerful Flame Link technique, he also carries the Curse of Bitter Frost, something that’s slowly killing him.

As if that weren’t enough, the demonic embodiment of Wrath is trying to take over his body!?
description.zh:
拉昂的一生就像一条拴着锁链的狗。
然而，造化弄人，他获得了新生
--即使他的怒火依然留在断裂的锁链之中。
终于能够自立，他决定按照自己的意愿生活。
“我会杀死一切阻挡我的人，神也不例外。”

title.en: Boku wa Ayashii Kimi no Mono

altTitles.ja: 僕は妖しいキミのもの

description.en: Shou-chan is a member of the public morals committee who wants everyone to have a healthy relationship, and is worried about his childhood friend Sayo. Because she carries the blood of a succubus, she often approaches her beloved her Shou-chan in any way to make him "lovey-dovey sex". As he persists in having a healthy relationship, which is full of lust and surrounded by questionable students, will Shou-chan manage to keep his sanity?
description.ja: どんな相手とも「正しい関係」でありたい風紀委員・しょうちゃんは、幼なじみの紗夜に悩んでいた。淫魔の血を引く彼女は、「ラブラブえっち♡」をすべく、あの手この手で大好きなしょうちゃんにアプローチ。紗夜を筆頭に、「正しくない関係」を望む妖しい生徒たちに囲まれて、しょうちゃんは正しさを守りきれるのか！？
description.es-la: Shou-chan es un miembro del comité de moral pública que quiere que todo el mundo tenga una relación sana, y está preocupado por su amiga de la infancia, Sayo. Debido a que ella lleva la sangre de un súcubo, a menudo se acerca a su amado Shou-chan, de cualquier manera para darle “sexo amoroso y alegre”. Mientras él se empeña en tener una relación sana, la cual está llena de lujuria y rodeada de estudiantes cuestionables, ¿logrará Shou-chan mantener su cordura?

title.en: Reincarnated into a Villainous Family, But I'm Ignoring the Plot and Going Rogue!

altTitles.ja: 黒幕一家に転生したけど原作無視して独立する

altTitles.en: I Was Reincarnated Into a Villainous Family, But I'll Ignore the Original Story and Live Independently.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuromaku Ikka ni Tensei Shita Kedo Gensaku Mushishite Dokuritsu Suru

description.en: A voluntary banishment declaration from the family, known as a 'mastermind family'! In order to avoid destruction, Yuri decides to live an unconventional slow life in the frontier...!?
description.ja: 黒幕一家と称される実家から、自主的追放宣言！ ユーリは破滅を回避するために、辺境にて規格外のスローライフを送ることに…!?

altTitles.ja: ひらやすみ

description.en: 29-year-old freeter Ikuta Hiroto is a carefree young man without a love life, regular job, or any real worries about the future. He inherits an old house from the neighbourhood granny, where his 18-year-old cousin, Natsumi moves in with him to study art in Tokyo. This is a story about Hiroto and the people around him who struggle with life.
description.ru: Двадцатидевятилетний работник на полставки Икута Хирото — беззаботный парень, у которого нет ни личной жизни, ни постоянной работы, ни каких-либо беспокойств о собственном будущем. В наследство от соседской бабушки ему достаётся старый дом, куда переезжает его восемнадцатилетняя двоюродная сестра Нацуми, чтобы учиться искусству в Токио. Это история о Хирото и окружающих его людях, которые борются с жизнью.
description.uk: 29-річний Ікута Хірото — безтурботний молодий чоловік без особистого життя, постійної роботи та реальних турбот про майбутнє. Він успадковує старий будинок від сусідської бабусі, куди переїжджає його 18-річна двоюрідна сестра Нацумі, щоб вивчати мистецтво в Токіо. Це історія про Хірото та людей навколо нього, які борються з життям.
description.pt-br: Ikuta Hiroto, de 29 anos, é um jovem despreocupado sem uma vida amorosa, emprego regular ou qualquer preocupação real com o futuro: um "freeter". Ele herda uma velha casa da avó do bairro, onde sua prima de 18 anos, Natsumi, vai morar com ele para estudar arte em Tóquio. Esta é uma história sobre Hiroto e as pessoas ao seu redor que lutam contra a vida.

title.en: The Solitary Gal Narumi-san Loves Cute Things

altTitles.ja: 孤高のギャルなるみさんは可愛いものがお好き
